00024 #ifndef __SYS_THREAD_WIN32_H__
00025 #define __SYS_THREAD_WIN32_H__
00026 
00027 #if defined(WIN32) && defined(_REENTRANT)
00028 
00029 #if !defined(USE_NSPR_THREADS) && !defined(__POSIX)
00030 
00031 #include "sys/ThreadInterface.h"
00032 #include "sys/Conf.h"
00033 
00034 #define sleep Sleep
00035 
00036 // A typedef and macro to make _beginthreadex look like CreateThread
00037 // See MSDN Wind32 Q&A  July 1999  by Jeffrey Richter
00038 typedef unsigned (__stdcall *THREAD_START_FN) (void *);
00039 
00040 #if defined(USE_CREATETHREAD)
00041 #   define __CREATETHREAD(psa, cbStack, pfnStartAddr, \
00042                        pvParam, fdwCreate, pdwThreadID) \
00043         CreateThread(psa, cbStack, \
00044         (LPTHREAD_START_ROUTINE)(pfnStartAddr), \
00045         (void*)pvParam, fdwCreate, \
00046         pdwThreadID)
00047 
00048 #else
00049 #   define  __CREATETHREAD(psa, cbStack, pfnStartAddr,         \
00050                         pvParam, fdwCreate, pdwThreadID)    \
00051    ((HANDLE) _beginthreadex(                                \
00052                             (void *) (psa),                 \
00053                             (unsigned) (cbStack),           \
00054                             (THREAD_START_FN) (pfnStartAddr), \
00055                             (void *) (pvParam),             \
00056                             (unsigned) (fdwCreate),         \
00057                             (unsigned *) (pdwThreadID)))
00058 #endif
00059 namespace sys
00060 {
00061 class ThreadWin32 : public ThreadInterface<HANDLE>
00062 {
00063 public:
00064     typedef ThreadInterface<HANDLE> Parent_T;
00065 
00066     ThreadWin32(std::string name = "") : Parent_T(name)
00067     {}
00068 
00069     ThreadWin32(sys::Runnable *target,
00070                 std::string name = "") :
00071             Parent_T(target, name)
00072     {}
00073 
00074     ThreadWin32(sys::Runnable *target,
00075                 std::string name,
00076                 int level,
00077                 int priority) :
00078             Parent_T(target, name, level, priority)
00079     {}
00080 
00081 
00082     virtual ~ThreadWin32();
00083     virtual void start();
00084     static DWORD WINAPI __start(void *v)
00085     {
00086 
00087         STANDARD_START_CALL(ThreadWin32, v);
00088 
00089         return 0;
00090     }
00091 
00093     virtual bool kill()
00094     {
00095         return false;
00096     }
00097     virtual bool join();
00098     static void yield()
00099     {
00100 #ifdef USING_WINNT
00101         SwitchToThread();
00102 #else
00103         throw SystemException("Thread::yield() only supported in windows NT 4.0 or greater!");
00104 #endif
00105 
00106     }
00107 };
00108 
00109 }
00110 
00111 #endif // Not using other thread package
00112 #endif // Is windows
00113 #endif
